amendment.description: To ensure the availability of electromagnetic spectrum for public safety entities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3773 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3773 proposed by Senator Burns to Amendment SA 3766. (consideration: CR S9904-9905) To ensure the availability of electromagnetic spectrum for public safety entities.
